metadata.title: USN-6308-1 -- Libqb vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Libqb incorrectly handled certain messages. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6308-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libqb100 - 2.0.6-2ubuntu0.1 doxygen2man - 2.0.6-2ubuntu0.1 libqb-dev - 2.0.6-2ubuntu0.1 libqb-tools - 2.0.6-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
